name: Hyper Cascade
description:
A portal-style game about solving puzzels using mirrors!  It's pretty rough around the edges. I didn't have a ton of time to bring it together before the deadline!  I hope you guys enjoy it.

WASD to Move, Space to Jump, Left click to place mirrors and Right click to use your Mirror Shield.

Made for the Weekly Game Jam: Week 148 - Theme: Mirror

Made by Connor Robb
